thread.title: ‘They Ran Out of Hitler Analogies’: Fox’s Gutfeld Rips Whoopi Goldberg for Comparing Trump to the Taliban
thread.title_full: ‘They Ran Out of Hitler Analogies’: Fox’s Gutfeld Rips Whoopi Goldberg for Comparing Trump to the Taliban

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘They Ran Out of Hitler Analogies’: Fox’s Gutfeld Rips Whoopi Goldberg for Comparing Trump to the Taliban
text:
‘They Ran Out of Hitler Analogies’: Fox’s Gutfeld Rips Whoopi Goldberg for Comparing Trump to the Taliban by Justin Baragona | 8:58   Video 
During today’s broadcast of Fox News’ The Five , co-host Greg Gutfeld took aim at The View’s Whoopi Goldberg for the comedian directly comparing President Donald Trump to the Taliban. 
Gutfeld, calling The View “Hell’s DMV,” first played a clip of Goldeberg saying the following: 
We have had a leader who’s repeatedly demeaned women, calling on the media to shut up, specifically wants to give preferential treatment based on religion, uh, are these values really much different than the Taliban? 
He immediately took a mocking tone towards Goldberg, exclaiming that it was “groundbreaking to hear a celebrity say something mean about the Taliban.” He then jeeringly noted that the “Taliban should sue” because “they ran out of Hitler analogies.” 
Gutfeld went on to talk about radical Islam and how that didn’t compare to anything Trump’s “rudeness.” 
Watch the clip above, via Fox News. 
[image via screengrab]
